participant_abstract.sent: This meeting was designed to thrash out the conceptual details of the product.
The team members were very cooperative and the meeting proceeded smoothly, ending ahead of time in a positive mood with all members in agreement over a plan of action.

participant_actions.sent: Paul : Look at marketable characteristics of the product.

participant_decisions.sent: Decisions were made to fix product features: scroll wheel, mode change feature with backlit buttons, dock charger, locator beacon, plastic casing with rubber outer-casing.
Rejected ideas included: LCD display, flip-phone style and low-cost budget remote idea.

participant_problems.sent: Issues were keeping the tone professional at times, and deciding on product features.
